title: Activated a skin rental instead of upgrading...
body: I just bought some chests and was delighted to get the 'Championship Thresh' skin as thresh is my main champion and I have been looking for that skin for a few weeks now! After disenchanting to get enough orange dust to upgrade the skin, I clicked on the 7 day trial by accident. I am wondering if there is anyway to reverse this action/ refund it. thanks :(

replies.body: Of course i would not be so upset if it wasn't a legacy skin that cant be purchased. I hope something can be done..
Did you get the skin shard back? I wonder because that just happened to me with Riot k-9 Nasus :(

Omg, that sucks.  :X :X   I can't make any guarantees, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We like to look at each case individually, so hopefully we can work something out.  See you there!
Great I will do that, thank you.
